subject: College Athletics
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Kessler, a lawyer who helped bring free agency to the N.F.L. and the N.B.A., says his lawsuit will take down the “cartel” that controls college sports.
snippet: Jeffrey Kessler, a lawyer who helped bring free agency to the N.F.L. and the N.B.A., says his lawsuit will take down the “cartel” that controls college sports.
